name: Those Gods Below Us
description:
This game is currently incomplete - please check back in a day or two if you would like to play the full version! Current version is v1.1

I understand now. Those Gods below us have risen up and come to claim our world. We must pay for our sins.

A Lovecraftian 2D puzzle platformer, made for the r/SoloDevelopment Winter Jam 2023. The theme was "End is Near".
